chrome.notes: This was removed from the Enable Experimental Web Platform Features due to a Web compatibility issue. In June 2017, it was removed entirely from the browsers. This is documented in Chromium bug 87553.

firefox_android.notes: Support for the contextmenu attribute has been removed from Firefox for Android (See bug 1424252).

opera.notes: This was removed from the Enable Experimental Web Platform Features due to a Web compatibility issue. In June 2017, it was removed entirely from the browsers. This is documented in Chromium bug 87553.

firefox.notes: id is a true global attribute only since Firefox 32.

firefox_android.notes: id is a true global attribute only since Firefox 32.
